mapper:
SELECT id "id" , itemName "itemName" , entpName "entpName" , itemSeq "itemSeq" , efcyQesitm "efcyQesitm" , useMethodQesitm "useMethodQesitm" , atpnWarnQesitm "atpnWarnQesitm" , atpnQesitm "atpnQesitm" , depositMethodQesitm "depositMethodQesitm" , intrcQesitm "intrcQesitm" , seQesitm "seQesitm" , itemImage "itemImage" FROM medicine WHERE 1=1
depositMethodQesitm varchar(1000), intrcQesitm varchar(1000), seQesitm varchar(1000), itemImage varchar(1000)
